language.tt_tip: Tip: Hover over the labels to get more information about the requested data.
language.tt_serveradress: The adress with which you are connecting to the server (Can be an IP-Adress or hostname).
language.tt_serverport: The port through which you are connecting to your server via the client (Default: 9987).
language.tt_login: If a login is required that the viewer can get the needed information (Default: yes).
language.tt_password: Password corresponding to the username above.
language.tt_servericons: If you set this on true, custom icons will be downloaded automatically.
language.tt_imagepack: If the setting above is FALSE, the viewer will use the imagepack provided here.
language.tt_arrow: If you set that on TRUE, the viewer will show arrows next to the channel similar as in the client.
language.tt_caching: If this on true the viewer will buffer the data it received. It is strongly recommended to enable caching due to stability reasons.
language.tt_standard_cachetime: The time in seconds the viewer should buffer the serverdata (Recommended: 60).
language.setpw: Please insert a new password for the interface once:
language.enterpw: Please enter the Password for the Interface:
language.select_config_descr: Please select one of this existing configfiles:
language.select_new_config: Or create a new configfile (If no configfile is available please name the new one "config"):
language.module_edit_info: Click on a module to edit the modules configfile. Drag and sort the modules in the order how you want them getting outputted.
language.edit_xml: You can edit the configfile of the module here. If you have finished just press the button
